document_data.name: Society of Creative Castle Design and Construction
document_data.orgname: the Society of Creative Castle Design and Construction
document_data.mainbody: The '''Society of Creative Castle Design and Construction''' was an honorary order whose members were devoted to [[Gond]], the Wonderbringer.<ref name="FaA-p63" >
document_data.Organization: Members of this organization were skilled architects and builders whose work focused on the design and construction of castles, fortresses, and similar structures. They praised Gond through their work.
